alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Paulding, Haralson, Carroll and southwestern Polk Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Val-Do-Mar to near Esom Hill, and moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Buchanan, Villa Rica, Bremen, Temple, Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Whitesburg, Waco, Etna, Eubank Lake, Esom Hill, Bowdon Junction, Antioch, Seaton Lake, Clem, Abilene, Draketown and Felton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Georgia.
